H2.text: where did russians originate. Finno-Ugric Tribes

A4.text: Genetic research has shown that the genomes of East Slavs are homogenous and contrary to popular belief, unaffected by Turkic or Mongol influences.

A5.text: The Skify were a movement of Russian nationalist religious mysticists who saw Russia as a Messiah-like figure and identified with the ancient Scythians.
